title: Math Microlearning Design Based on MOOC Quality Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Competency development program for evaluating math MOOC quality in mobile learning environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five dimensions of the MOOC quality evaluation framework: instructional design, interactivity, management system, accessibility, and methodology
Learners can analyze the quality of mathematics MOOC content using a 5-point rubric-based evaluation scale
Learners can interpret MOOC evaluation results from the perspective of employment relevance
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
